comment.text: The "StorageManagement" translation key is used to display the storage management section title on the Portal Settings page. It provides a clear and concise label for this section, helping users navigate through the settings. This translation key appears in a header context, likely as part of a category or tab navigation menu.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While "Διαχείριση αποθ. χώρου" is understandable, a more accurate and common translation for "Storage management" would be "Διαχείριση αποθήκευσης" or "Διαχείριση χώρου αποθήκευσης". "Αποθ. χώρου" is a shortened form that might be less clear to some users.

The Armenian translation "Պահպանման կառավարում" translates more accurately to "Preservation Management" rather than "Storage Management". While 'storage' can be associated with 'preservation,' the direct equivalent of 'storage' is not conveyed.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more accurate translation like "Տվյալների պահպանման աշխատանքներ" (Data Preservation Work) or "Պահեստային աշխատանքներ" (Storage Operations) depending on the intended meaning of 'Storage Management'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While "Zarządzanie pamięcią" translates literally to "Memory management", in the context of "Storage management", a more accurate translation would be "Zarządzanie pamięcią masową" or "Zarządzanie przestrzenią dyskową". "Pamięcią" can imply RAM, not persistent storage.

The Sinhala translation "ආචයන කළමනාකරණය" translates to something like "device management" or "apparatus management" and not "storage management." The word 'ආචයන' (aachayana) refers to a device or apparatus.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: භ 収納 කළමනාකරණය (Bh 収納 kamanaakarayanaya) - This would more accurately represent 'storage management'. Alternatively, තැටි කළමනාකරණය (thati kamanaakarayanaya) - meaning 'data management' or 'storage management' could be used, depending on the specific context.
